item.title: Hugo Is Interesting
item.description: So, I wanted a way to create a wiki/blog so that I could document all of the stuff that I do inside of my homelab, just in case I break something and need to fix it. Why I Didn’t Choose WordPress I looked at WordPress first and while it could have done what I wanted, I decided I wanted something that I didn’t host so if my server goes down I can still access it.
